remarks:
Add a conjunct to left of antecedent and consequent in a deduction. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) 

---

 Add a conjunct to left of antecedent and consequent in a deduction. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
anim1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
anim2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( th /\ ps ) -> ( th /\ ch ) ) ) $.
